data.name: PianoBoard Server
data.detailed_description:
Put on your CardBoard and plug in the MIDI keyboard!
It's a play time - with PianoBoard you can dust off your piano and perform your favorite songs!

Print a tracking image, put it above the piano keyboard and play - no need to switch between score and instrument any more!
The melody will always be before your very eyes.

PianoBoard Server enables feedback from MIDI keyboard/digital piano in your mobile AR PianoBoard app (Android 4.4+ is supported currently, a back-facing camera with autofocus is required).

Your PC and mobile phone should be connected to the same local network (f.e. via WiFi router) or via tethering (i.e. you can also connect your PC to the phone' mobile access point if it supports that).

* Connect your MIDI device to the PC, select it in the list and mark it as favorite so that it is selected as input device automatically on next run.
* A smartphone VR headset with headstrap and camera hole is required
data.about_the_game:
Put on your CardBoard and plug in the MIDI keyboard!
It's a play time - with PianoBoard you can dust off your piano and perform your favorite songs!

Print a tracking image, put it above the piano keyboard and play - no need to switch between score and instrument any more!
The melody will always be before your very eyes.

PianoBoard Server enables feedback from MIDI keyboard/digital piano in your mobile AR PianoBoard app (Android 4.4+ is supported currently, a back-facing camera with autofocus is required).

Your PC and mobile phone should be connected to the same local network (f.e. via WiFi router) or via tethering (i.e. you can also connect your PC to the phone' mobile access point if it supports that).

* Connect your MIDI device to the PC, select it in the list and mark it as favorite so that it is selected as input device automatically on next run.

data.short_description: PianoBoard Server enables feedback from MIDI keyboard/digital piano in your mobile AR PianoBoard app.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
data.reviews:
“As soon as I ran the server on my machine the app on the phone connected straight away which I was really surprised with. My keyboard was detected once connected to the computer too, I use a Roland PCR 500. Set up is as simple as that for anyone wondering. The AR is very on point here and I am no handyman at all and anyone can get this set up no problems what so ever.”
TysonGT

“Coolest idea, like guitar hero but you actually get to play a real instrument. And plus it sounds nicer than clicking buttons!”
WindmillCookies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86/x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 4.4+, back-facing camera with autofocus, smartphone VR headset with headstrap and camera hole

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: x86/x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
